data.name: Ancient Siberia
data.detailed_description:
Great Tartary is an amazing gaming world: ancient forests, green valleys, great snow mountains, wild animals and mysterious monsters. Each player will go on a fascinating journey through the Ancient Siberia. He has to survive in the harsh conditions. The game features different climatic zones and implemented the change of day and night. At any moment the sunny weather can change into snow storm.


Feature is incomplete and will be implemented in the future.
Your game begins with a child character which grows up and gets necessary skills (childhood will be able in full version). When you are a child, no one can kill you. But at the same time you will not be able to take part in PvP. Player's upgrading depends on the character's actions, such as sword fighting which boosts the swords play and so on. Also, you shouldn’t forget that after death players lose all loot, that they carried with them.


Every action affects the future of the character. If you decide to rob a trader either kill another player, you will become a bandit. Remember that your actions can affect your future. This feature is not yet implemented completely but will be filled as soon as possible.


The developers have created a non-target combat system: the player simply presses the button to kick, and is using rolls, blocks, defense, calculates the force of the blow and fix on the target.


The system of shipbuilding is soon to be implemented. Reaching a certain level, the player will be able to build a boat or a ship to participate in large-scale water battles and collect resources.


In Ancient Siberia, you will be able to choose the location for your future home where you can store chests and other personal belongings. It’s ease to build a house, but don't forget that this is Survival, so you will have to pay taxes, harvest wood, and to buy the necessary tools. Remember, your home is protected only when you can protect it physically.


If the path of an craftsman is not for you, you can always become a master of magic. In the world of Ancient Siberia there is a unique system of magical runes that allow you to enchant weapons, armor and jewelry. Players can also try to teleport. All the runes can be bought or made by yourself, but this requires some degree of skill. This feature is not yet implemented completely but will be filled as soon as possible.


In the world of Ancient Siberia, your character will have to survive in the harsh environment, where nothing is given simply so. Starting the game with minimal inventory, you should make every effort to create useful hardware, powerful weapons and magical runes.


Each player can join a Guild or join any clan. You will be able together to build homes and to build relationships with other players ' clans and perform tasks and earn money together.
This feature is not yet implemented completely but will be filled as soon as possible.


The game server is able to accommodate 250 simultaneous playing users. It is planned to increase the number of servers and the number of simultaneous playing users. Moreover, we planned to create hierarchy of servers according to the level: easy, medium and difficult. The choice of server affects the difficulty of monsters and the level of realism. If you chose a difficult server, you needs to move faster to adapt to the change of day and night, and in the shortest possible time to find clothes, food and weapons. Otherwise your character will not survive.


The world of Ancient Siberia based on myths about the great Tartary, which was located on the territory from the Urals to Alaska and Nova Zembla to Tibet. Creating NPC, the developers were inspired by Slavic myths and legends. Birch bark signs, hidden in key locations of the map, will help the player to learn the history of the world. This feature will be added soon.


On the map a large number of hidden quests. These quests not marked, but you have to pay attention to strange buildings and the specific details of the world. If luck is on your side, you'll be able to find a quest, complete it and get reward.

data.short_description: Survival Sandbox MMO RPG which tells you about survival in Ancient Siberia. Users will have to fight with monsters, to build their own castles, to use magic, to participate in naval battles and tournaments, to join guilds and create their own clans. In Ancient Siberia only strongest survive.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G3xxx+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 550 Ti +
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: EAX 2.0 support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
